author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [PSReadLine](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine) from 2.0.0-beta6 to 2.0.0-rc1.
Release notes *Sourced from [PSReadLine's releases](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/releases).* > ## RC1 of PSReadLine 2.0 > ### v2.0.0-rc1 - 12/11/2019 > > You can get the `v2.0.0-rc1` version of the PSReadLine module from [PowerShell Gallery](https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/PSReadLine/2.0.0-rc1). > This release includes the following bug fixes: > > * Fix an assertion in debug build that crashes PSReadLine ([#1199](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1199)) (Thanks [@​springcomp](https://github.com/springcomp)) > * Fix an `IndexOutOfRangeException` in VI mode ([#1200](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1200)) (Thanks [@​springcomp](https://github.com/springcomp)) > * Improve handling of color in prompts ([#1180](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1180)) (Thanks [@​lzybkr](https://github.com/lzybkr)) > * Fix an 'ArgumentOutOfRangeException' when error prompt contains CJK ([#1206](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1206)) > * Add instructions for updating `PowerShellGet` for Windows PowerShell users ([#1222](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1222)) (Thanks [@​espoelstra](https://github.com/espoelstra)) > * Correct cursor positioning ([#1221](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1221)) (Thanks [@​msftrncs](https://github.com/msftrncs)) > * Utilize LengthInBufferCells when creating Completions Menu ([#1214](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1214)) (Thanks [@​msftrncs](https://github.com/msftrncs)) > * Ensure the desired column number is used while moving up or down in VI mode ([#1122](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1122)) (Thanks [@​springcomp](https://github.com/springcomp)) > * Make the continuation prompt's color sequence always explicitly specified ([#1238](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1238))
Commits - [`616b8ae`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/616b8ae0cf10b9d3ab1ef7d9f6720be94686347e) Use '2.0.0-rc1' instead of 'rc.1' due to the PowerShellGallery's limitation (... - [`d02d600`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/d02d6004f2f2ad8a788b91d7076ba386c0d1e4e7) Update the `InformationalVersion` to `2.0.0-rc.1` ([#1240](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1240)) - [`7b27696`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/7b27696eea6abae0d8a2fb7a06df40342f159ab9) Update ChangeLog and version for 2.0.0-rc.1 release ([#1239](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1239)) - [`8c95f93`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/8c95f93b6a9f2a24f4284f166d0c5b8d557225cb) Make the continuation prompt's color sequence always explicitly specified. (#... - [`9ad8eb6`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/9ad8eb6769a7ca31d741a31ad3122689d61f1b47) Ensure the desired column number is used while moving up or down in VI mode (... - [`f31538e`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/f31538e3e7586093414c77559ce88654bb3e10f5) Utilize LengthInBufferCells when creating Completions Menu ([#1214](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1214)) - [`1c41239`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/1c41239b349807687eb85b25deccc13492cdfaf2) Correct cursor positioning ([#1221](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1221)) - [`725e9f1`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/725e9f1a8328526688899781bf6275f419552ce4) Add instructions for updating PowerShellGet for Windows PowerShell users ([#1222](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1222)) - [`6f0ccf4`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/6f0ccf40ca89b237cd5cf0d05c1050b8d1ff9927) Fix an 'ArgumentOutOfRangeException' when error prompt contains CJK ([#1206](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1206)) - [`599e178`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/599e1784a96d1acfce8d4d2a561c82b07920ada4) Improve handling of color in prompts ([#1180](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1180)) - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/compare/v2.0.0-beta6...v2.0.0-rc1)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=PSReadLine&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.0.0-beta6&new-version=2.0.0-rc1)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=PSReadLine&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.0.0-beta6&new-version=2.0.0-rc1) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in the `.dependabot/config.yml` file in this repo: - Update frequency - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired)

comments.author: dependabot-preview[bot]
comments.body: Looks like PSReadLine is up-to-date now, so this is no longer needed.

title: Bump PSReadLine from 2.0.0-beta6 to 2.0.0-rc1 in /src/Modules
